20110104011713.000|20110104011715.000|CC1|>> TWO IMPORTANT POINTS.        
20110104011715.000|20110104011718.000|CC1|STRESS TESTS MAY NOT MEAN THAT  
20110104011718.000|20110104011719.000|CC1|IN WOMEN.                       
20110104011719.000|20110104011721.000|CC1|IT MAY ALSO BE A FALSE POSITIVE,
20110104011721.000|20110104011722.000|CC1|SAYING IF YOU HAVE HEART        
20110104011722.000|20110104011724.000|CC1|PROBLEMS WHEN YOU DON'T.        
20110104011724.000|20110104011727.000|CC1|IT CAN ALSO MISS HEART DISEASES 
20110104011727.000|20110104011731.000|CC1|SO WOMEN -- IT MUST BE USED WITH
20110104011731.000|20110104011732.000|CC1|THIS IN MIND OR WHEN YOU STEP UP
20110104011732.000|20110104011736.000|CC1|YOUR WORKOUT THIS YEAR.
